Home  >  Research at BB :: Entomology

column4: • Exploitation of new chemistry to control pests of sugar beet, especially soil pests, aphids (including resistant biotypes) and spider mites.
• Provision of advice on pest control to the sugar beet industry.
• Evaluation of environmental impact of weed management in and around in sugar beet fields, including set-aside headlands

column3: • Management of weeds in sugar beet to enhance the environment
